Topic.Title: Then I said "Why don't I go over there and raddle YOUR

Posts.EditableText: What would you say dicussing warez is, alex? I have a question about making bots on Ypager, Would that be something within the warez limits? Sorry to bother you about something so stupid.
Posts.HTML: What would you say dicussing warez is, alex? I have a question about making bots on Ypager, Would that be something within the warez limits? Sorry to bother you about something so stupid.

Posts.EditableText:
Warez, is basically say.... an illegal copy of a program.  a bot for Yahoo isnt illegal.  MSN Plus is a bot, and microsoft knows fully well its available, and they have allowed it to be downloaded.

Im not too sure what the rules are for Yahoo, but it shouldnt be a problem, and i dont think bots are illegal, just as long as it wont harm anybodys system

Posts.EditableText: I've made and set up a simple bot. I call it harass bot V1. It responds to simple comands such as hi, bye, are you a bot ect. I am so happy with it. anyway. When trapped by a bot, just think of jakk. He's good people.
